title: New Creator: Rahaf Harfoush
body:
Name: Rahaf Harfoush

Social: https://twitter.com/rahafharfoushr
https://rahafharfoush.com/

Info: Rahaf Harfoush is a Strategist, Digital Anthropologist, and Best-Selling Author who focuses on the intersections between emerging technology, innovation, and digital culture. She is the Executive Director of the Red Thread Institute of Digital Culture and teaches “Innovation & Emerging Business Models” at Sciences Politique’s school of Management and Innovation in Paris.  She is also a growing influencer on Clubhouse. 

Use Case:
Interested in creating a coin as part of a "movement" or collective related to themes that will be covered in her upcoming book at the intersection of business and social.  

Interested in established a "pay it forward' coin primarily to be used on Clubhouse.  It will be used to recognize folks for valuable contributions, as well as donation/crowdfunding goals for community members. 

Treasury Grant Tier: $1,000

A 'yes' vote will authorize Rahaf for a Creator Coin, and a $1,000 treasury grant.
A 'no' vote will reject Rahaf from the platform.
author: 0x893D2E776F21143354123241bC1DC237C47BC3fC
